trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Marysville
There were no other sightings in Marysville on or around April 13th 2012
Summary: big star like figure when zommed in look like moon
divs: Sighting Detailsmy grandma and brother just got home from late night shopping when they were grabbing the bags the spotted a big star looking thing they told my uncle then he wanted to get a closer look he then grabbed his camara and zoomed in on it when he zoomed in it almost looked like a moon then when it got closer it had like a glow around it bot the outlines were blured we then went inside and looked at the footage we were all shocked at what we were seeing we went back out side and it looked like it was getting lower we reprorted it to the marysville police department and the police officer looked very scared at the sight of it we went inside and went to sleep for the night and in the mornig it was gone
